CustomField.description: Used for REC Shadow Pipeline Smartlist
CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(REC_Status__c), "1. Circled / Due Diligence", "1. Circled", "2. Quoted / Term Sheet","2. Quoted", "3. Active / Underwriting","3. Active", "4. Preview","4. Preview", "5. Shadow", "5.Shadow", "6. Dead / Passed / Not Active","6. Dead", "7. Portfolio","7. Portfolio", "8. Ex-Portfolio","8. Ex-Portfolio", "")
CustomField.label: RCPS
